wikipedia_page.main: Harold "Harry" Watson (1883 – 15 February 1963) was a British athlete who competed at the 1908 Summer Olympics in London. He died in Sutton, London. In the 100 metres, Watson took third place in his first round heat and did not advance to the semifinals.
